timeline.bodyText:
Should we deprecate the other accessors for ids in favor of this one?
It has already helpers for bytes for ids and we can remove the helpers to convert.
timeline.author: bogdandrutu

replies.bodyText: This one was deprecated in favor of getSpanContext(), so I think we want to delete this one, either way.
replies.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: This is in the link not in the SpanData :)
replies.author: bogdandrutu
